name: The Duel: Test Drive II
overview: Redline a Lamborghini Diablo - speed shift a Porsche 959 - spin out in a Ferrari F40 - engines roar and cop sirens wail as you blow past your competition at 200 MPH. You'll see it all through the windshield as you scream across scorching deserts, slice through cities and skid around coastline curves - maxing out three of the world's fastest high performance cars.
